item.title: Starting a new learning journey
item.description: With the new year comes new resolutions, and creating this post on this website is one of them! I’ve created this website, with the help of the glorious blogdown package, to achieve some analysis goals. There is really only one goal and that is to LEARN TO DO ANALYSIS! But I’ve broken down that goal into smaller parts for the sake of over planning: blogdown::shortcode('tweet', '1079495206603538433') My #RStats goals for 2019:
